description:
The Wu-Tang Clan has long since been a multimedia group, putting their name behind comic books, a TV show, video games, and more. Now they're headed back to the world of gaming again with Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver, a co-op brawler that has you rescuing the Clan from the Deceiver. Check out the latest trailer shown at Summer Game Fest 2025.

This 3D brawler has three core pillars according to developer Brass Lion: Rebuild Shaolin, Battle with the Wu, and Protect Ya Neck. Ghostface Killah asks you to rescue his Wu brothers so that yo
title: Rescue The Wu-Tang Clan In Wu-Tang: Rise Of The Deceiver

description:
After teasing a major announcement all week, 1047 Games has revealed something new for its free-to-play shooter Splitgate 2, which has its 1.0 launch today. The announcement at Summer Game Fest 2025 was that Splitgate 2 is not only getting a battle royale mode, but that it's out now alongside Splitgate 2.

Take a look at the launch trailer below. "Yes, we actually did it," the developer said about launching a battle royale mode.
title: Splitgate Battle Royale Mode Out Now Alongside Splitgate 2 Official Release

description:
Next week, Build a Rocket Boy and former Grand Theft Auto lead developer Leslie Benzies will debut MindsEye, a sci-fi action-adventure that has more than a passing resemblance to the GTA games. Players may not be familiar with the game's hero, Jacob Diaz, but they'll surely recognize Agent 47 from the Hitman games, who makes a cameo at the end of MindsEye's Summer Game Fest trailer.

Discover Mindseye when it launches on June 10th from Build a Rocket Boy and IOI Partners!
title: Hitman Is Coming To MindsEye This Year

description:
At Summer Game Fest, Drinkbox Studios revealed that it's making the leap to 3D with new co-op action game Blighted.

The Toronto-based developer is known for its vibrant 2D games Guacamelee and Nobody Saves The World, although judging from this first look, it's not sacrificing its distinct aesthetic.

📢 We’re excited to announce our new game!
🧠 Battle your way through a psychedelic western nightmare to reclaim the memories of your people in Blighted, an action RPG from the creators of Guacamelee!
Wishlist on Steam now! https://t.co/vqyXw3OVEv
title: Guacamelee Dev Goes 3D With Co-Op Action Game Blighted

description:
RGG Studio's Project Century has a new trailer and a new name, both revealed at Summer Game Fest. Now dubbed Stranger Than Heaven, the game takes place in Japan during 1943. In the trailer, we get some looks at the scenery and nightlife of the time period, along with some glimpses of hard-hitting, bloody action gameplay.

No platforms or a release date were mentioned, but we assume that Stranger than Heaven will be targeting current-gen consoles and PC.

Developing....
title: Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio's Project Century Gets A Strange New Title

description:
Capcom pulled a fast one on Resident Evil fans during Summer Game Fest 2025, first teasing upcoming information about a new Resident Evil title sometime in the future, and then ending the show with a trailer for the next mainline title in the survival-horror franchise, Resident Evil Requiem.

Capcom also revealed the release date for the game: February 27, 2026. Check out the trailer below.

After the trailer reveal, Summer Game Fest host Geoff Keighley said the game "marks a bold shift for the franchise, both in tone and gameplay, and today's reveal isn't just about survival horror. Expect high-stakes cinematic action, too."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Resident Evil 9 Announced At Summer Game Fest With Trailer And Release Date

description:
New development team Cubit Studios revealed the first trailer for its debut game during Summer Game Fest 2025, a sci-fi action game called Infinitesimals.

Like Obsidian's Grounded, Infinitesimals follows a group of tiny people struggling to survive in a world that's much bigger than them, where even commonplace things like mushrooms pose a steep obstacle. Unlike Grounded, there's a lot more than just big bugs to deal with in Infinitesimals' world. The group of explorers you play as encounters an alien civilization with advanced robotics, and they don't all seem pleased to meet you.
title: Infinitesimals Is A New Honey I Shrunk The Kids-Style Sci-Fi Action Game

description:
If Sea of Thieves was too wet for you, good news: Wildgate should take care of that. From Dreamhaven, the studio founded by Blizzard co-founder Michael Morhaime, Wildgate is a 20-player, five-ship PvP game that tasks you and your crew with retrieving "The Artifact."

Wildgate looks like it's going to be a fast-moving game. Players are jumping between ships, blowing up doors, fighting with ship-to-ship cannons, and even moving each others' ships around. The colors are bright and exciting, and we're eager to see what's coming from this game.
title: Space PVP Game Wildgate Is Getting An Open Beta Next Week

description:
The highly anticipated mecha online shooter, Mecha Break, finally got a release date. Revealed during the Summer Game Fest 2025 show, players will be able to go toe to giant mechanical toe on July 1. And considering all of the "wonderful" feedback fans gave during its global open beta, the game seems primed to deliver an action-packed experience.

Developed by Amazing Seasun Games, Mecha Break is set in an alternate future where various factions fight over Earth's sole energy source: a highly toxic mineral called Corite. Due to its vol
title: Mecha Break's July Release Date Revealed At Summer Game Fest

description:
Bandai Namco premiered a handful of new titles during Summer Game Fest 2025, including a new, anime-inspired roguelike called Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree, which is coming to all major platforms this September.

Described as "a game drawing from classic Japanese art with a whimsical spin on Eastern mysticism," Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree pits players in the role of the titular priestess, who embarks on a journey alongside one of eight other guardians to defeat the evil Magatsu.

This is Towa, a new rogue-lite from @BandaiNamcoUS
title: Bandai Namco Reveals Stylish Roguelike, Towa And The Guardians Of The Sacred Tree

description:
The Summer Game Fest presentation introduced a new party game featuring Lego bricks, appropriately called Lego Party. The trailer showed a wide variety of party games, promising 60 in all, featuring a wide array of Lego brick styles from across the brickiverse.

Lego styles shown include Space, Pirates, and Ninjago, with settings and styles to match those through the various minigames. Like any good party game, you're always challenged with something new, so that meant different perspectives and types of games, from racing around a track to avoiding monsters, to painting the floor and more.

The announcement promises both Challenge Zones and minigames, cross-platform online play, and tons of minifigure customization. In fact, given all the permutations, you could make more than 1 billion minifig configurations. You compete for Golden Bricks, and like any good party game, you can sabotage your opponents with traps.
title: Lego Party Is A Party Game, With Lego

description:
IO Interactive has announced the next elusive target for Hitman: World of Assassination, and it's none other than Mads Mikkelsen's LeChiffre from the movie Casino Royale. You don't have to wait to play, as the new elusive target, called The Banker, is being added to the game today, June 6, the developer announced at Summer Game Fest.

Mikkelsen himself returns for this new DLC, and he appeared on stage at Summer Game Fest to hype it up. The new elusive target comes with in-game items to acquire, including a new "King of Cards" suit, silenced pistol, rope, and casino chip. The elusive target is available now through July 6.

HITMAN and 007 are coming together in a very unexpected way… yep Agent 47’s next target is Le Chiffre!
title: James Bond Villain Coming To Hitman Today As Elusive Target

description:
Summer Game Fest had plenty of big reveals, but perhaps the most surprising one was a brand-new Deadpool virtual reality game. Announced for Meta Quest 3 and Quest 3S VR headsets, this new game will see players control the merc with a mouth--voiced by actor Neil Patrick Harris--as he takes on classic villains like X-Men villains like Mojo and Lady Deathstrike.

Developer Twisted Pixel, known for a few other funny games, like 'Splosion Man, announced the game with a trailer that captures a lot of Deadpool's ridiculous banter, as well as a bunch of the flippy-shooty mayhem you'll get up to in the game. Watch it right here.

Marvel's Deadpool is set to launch later this year.
title: Marvel's Deadpool Brings The Merc With A Mouth To Virtual Reality

description:
Today, during Summer Game Fest Live with Geoff Keighley, Tribute Games--the developers behind Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge and the upcoming Marvel: Cosmic Invasion--announced its next project: Scott Pilgrim EX. It's the first Scott Pilgrim video game since Ubisoft's Scott Pilgrim Vs. The World in 2010, and one which many of Tribute Games's developers worked on.

Scott Pilgrim EX is a side-scrolling beat-'em-up game that features seven playable characters--each with their own unique special attacks--and up to four-player offline and online co-op. This new Scott Pilgrim adventure will also feature non-linear exploration, which will allow players to discover the in-game version of Toronto however they wish.
title: Scott Pilgrim EX Is A Return To A Retro Co-Op Beat-'Em'-Up For Scott And His Pals

description:
A release date for Dying Light: The Beast was officially revealed during Summer Game Fest 2025, and this new chapter in Techland's open-world zombie series will arrive on August 22 for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S.

The standalone adventure sees the return of Kyle Crane, Dying Light's original protagonist, and is set in the rural location of Castor Woods. After escaping from a decade in captivity and the horrific experiments performed on him by the Baron, Crane makes his way to the once-bustling tourist destination in search of vengeance and finds it overrun with zombies.

Like previous games, the infected people stalking the streets during the day will be the least of your worries, because once the sun sets, the worst of the zombie horde comes out to play. Fortunately, Crane has parkour skills and an off-road vehicle to help him outrun enemies, and when push comes to shove, the zombie DNA in his blood gi
title: Dying Light: The Beast Smashes Through The Zombie Horde In August

description:
Today, during Summer Game Fest Live with Geoff Keighley, Yacht Club Games announced that Mina The Hollower, its first new in-house IP since introducing Shovel Knight to the world in 2019, will launch on Halloween--and there's a free limited-time demo available on Steam right now.

Mina The Hollower is an action-adventure game made in the style of Game Boy Color-era games like The Legend Of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons/Ages. Players control the titular Mina, a mouse who's handy with a whip, as she travels through a spooky island in an attempt to save it from a dreadful curse.
title: Shovel Knight Dev's Mina The Hollower Launches On Halloween, Demo Out Now

description:
As part of Summer Game Fest, Frontier Developments announced the next Jurassic World Evolution game. Jurassic World Evolution 3 is coming to PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S on October 21, 2025, and like the games that came before it, players will manage dinosaur species and the park experience for guests.

Jurassic World Evolution 3 has more than 80 dinosaur species, and players will be able to breed and nurture them "across entire generations." That's right: We're getting baby dinos.

"Rear them from playful juveniles into awe-inspiring adults, each with distinct female, male, and juvenile variants," the developer said.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 Announced With Jeff Goldblum, Devs Used Generative AI

description:
Ahead of its launch in August, a new trailer for Mafia: The Old Country debuted at Summer Game Fest 2025. Teased earlier this week, the new look at the game showed off protagonist Enzo Favara in a spot of trouble as he braced himself for some violence at his door.

The trailer is titled "Loyalty is Everything," and it focuses on the importance of "family" (in the organized crime sense, of course) to Favara's fortunes. While centered on cinematics and storytelling, the trailer gives a sense of what it's like in Sicily in the early 20th century. The narrative overview we get suggests that Favara will have to navigate betrayal, retribution, and extortion in pursuit of wealth. It also emphasizes the extensive and brutal process of joining the Torrisi crime family, and how the connections between "family" members can go sour if trust is undermined.
title: Mafia: The Old Country Trailer Emphasizes Loyalty To "The Family"

description:
As the name implies, Lies of P: Overture is a prequel to the original 2023 souls-like, shedding light on the events that led to the Puppet Frenzy massacre and subsequent collapse of the city of Krat. At its beating, mechanical heart, however, Lies of P's first DLC expansion is a tale of personal tragedy and vengeance. While developer Neowiz hasn't implemented any drastic changes to the game's underlying mechanics in Overture, its storytelling has improved, further building on the atmospheric Belle Epoque-infused world it created as a much darker and more twisted spin on Carlo Collodi's The Adventures of Pinocchio. "Most unfortunately, in the lives of puppets, there is always a 'but' that spoils everything," is a popular quote attributed to the Italian author. In the case of Overture, this is fortunately not the case.

Rather than being a conventional prequel, Overture sees Geppetto's eponymous puppet travel back in time alongside his faithful companion, Gem
title: Lies Of P: Overture Review - Puppet Prelude

description:
The studio behind Lego Builder's Journey debuted its next game at Summer Game Fest, and it's an adorable co-op adventure starring--you guessed it--a pair of little Lego bricks. The brief trailer showed a blooming friendship between blue and orange 1x1 bricks as they worked together to solve puzzling challenges.

The game is built around two-player co-op--locally, or you can invite your friends to play for free with a Friend's Pass. Like Builder's Journey, the narrative is delivered without words. The world looks entirely built out of bricks, so you can snap and join your way through obstacles together.

The art style looks very similar to Builder's Journey, with a similar isometric perspective through some segments. But the two also find themselves floating down-river, navigating highways and trains, and joining themselves with other bricks to carry them. They seem to be making their way towards a rocket through most of the trailer, which ends with them watching it take o
title: Lego Voyagers Adorable Co-Op Adventure From Builder's Journey Dev

description:
Epic Games Publishing announced Wiredfly and Kong Orange's Out of Words during Summer Game Fest, a co-op side-scrolling action/adventure game. The characters have lost their mouths--and the ability to speak--and must work together during their colorful journey as they engage with a variety of challenges. A distinguishing feature is that all of the characters and environments have been crafted and animated using traditional stop-motion animation. No release date has yet been given.

Developing...
title: Out of Words Is A Charming, Colorful Co-op Stop-Motion Adventure

description:
At Summer Game Fest 2025, Bandai Namco revealed a teaser for Code Vein 2, a sequel to its 2019 action-RPG that many described as an anime Dark Souls. This sequel has an updated aesthetic while still retaining anime character designs.

While its predecessor was set in a post-apocalyptic future, this one seems to have a dark and gothic medieval fantasy setting (some Bloodborne vibes, perhaps). But the twist appears to be that it will also be crossing different timelines.

According to the official Code Vein 2 Twitter, you'll still be playing as Revenants--vampiric immortals from the previous game--and the description of being "bound by blood" would suggest that the two main characters pictured are siblings. There's also going to be plenty of more formidable boss fights, though judging by your character's transf
title: Code Vein 2 Is A Sequel Crossing Space And Time

description:
Chrono Odyssey is an action-focused multiplayer RPG with shades of Warframe. A new trailer dropped as part of Summer Game Fest, showing various players fighting eldritch monstrosities and ancient warriors. Players will be able to get their hands on the MMORPG later this month via a limited playtest on PC from June 20-22.

This story is developing.

Summer Game Fest Live 2025: All The Biggest Announcements And Games
title: Creepy Action MMO Chrono Odyssey Gets New Trailer, Limited Playtest Later In June

description:
Dotemu's upcoming beat-'em-up, Marvel Cosmic Invasion, has revealed two popular comic book characters for its ever-growing roster. Fans will be able to play as Rocket Raccoon and She-Hulk, easily switching between the two as they shoot and smash their way through hordes of enemies. At least, that's the way it looks via a new trailer showcased during the Summer Game Fest 2025 show.

Joining the cast of 15 Marvel characters--alongside the likes of Spider-Man, Captain Amer
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion's She Hulk And Rocket Raccoon Revealed At Summer Game Fest

description:
Capcom has been on a roll with resurrecting its best franchises, and its latest attempt is Onimusha. Onimusha: Way of the Sword first debuted at The Game Awards in December 2024, and now the latest trailer is giving us a closer look at the gameplay as part of the Summer Game Fest 2025 show.

We already knew that Onimusha: Way of the Sword would feature Musashi Miyamoto, the legendary historical swordsman, as the protagonist, and would be using the face of Toshiro Mifune, star of classic samurai films like Yojimbo and Seven Samuria. Now, though, it looks like we're getting deeper into the Musashi lore, as his archrival, Kojiro/Ganryu Sasaki, appears in the trailer, looking like he might be the lead antagonist.
title: Onimusha: Way Of The Sword Gets New Gameplay Look

description:
Developer Fumi Games and publisher PlaySide Studios didn't have a large slot at the first game presentation of Summer Game Fest 2025, but it did reveal that a veteran video game actor is lending his voice to the main character of Mouse: P.I. For Hire. As seen and heard in the trailer below, Troy Baker is voicing Jack Pepper in the game.

This game's visual style was inspired by the Disney cartoons th
title: Mouse: P.I. For Hire Casts Video Game Legend In The Lead Role

description:
Arc Raiders developer Embark Studios has officially announced that the multiplayer extraction shooter will launch for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S on October 30. Confirmed at Summer Game Fest, the release-date reveal was accompanied by a new trailer showing off more of the game's environment and PvPvE action.

Embark Studios--which was co-founded by Battlefield veteran Patrick Soderlund--first showed off Arc Raiders all the way back in 2021. The game is set in a post-apocalyptic world where humanity has been forced underground by the Arc machines: automatons programmed solely to seek and destroy. As a Raider, players have to regularly journey to the surface so that they can scavenge for supplies, but they'll also have to watch out for rival players looking to steal their loot.

A closed technical test for
title: Arc Raiders Is Locked And Loaded For An October Launch

description:
Mario Kart World sports tons of items with a great combination of new inclusions like the Golden Shell, classics like the Blue Shell, and even some items like the Feather that have been missing from the series for a long time. Perhaps because it's so chock-a-block with item variations, I couldn't help but notice that one of my all-time favorite items is nowhere to be found once again: the Fake Item Box.

The Fake Item Box debuted in Mario Kart 64 and continued into Double Dash, Mario Kart DS, and Mario Kart Wii. It was, like it says on the tin, a doppelganger of the regular item box, but it would knock you over more like a shell. The fake box would look different enough from a regular box that you could spot it--the question mark would be upside-down, an
title: Mario Kart World Should've Brought Back One Of The Best Items
The Next Little Mega Man Manga Volume Launches August 19
Get All 291 Episodes Of Dragon Ball Z On Blu-Ray For $115

description:
Switch 2 released this week with Cyberpunk 2077 in its launch lineup, showing off what the new hardware can do. Recently, players discovered that the Switch 2 version of Cyberpunk supports mouse and keyboard as input controls, giving you more options with which to play CD Projekt Red's RPG.

To be clear, this means that Cyberpunk supports normal mice, not just the mouse functionality that the Joy-Con 2 can do. Although Nintendo did not extensively discuss this compatibility ahead of the console's release, Switch 2 owners have found that it appears to work natively with keyboards and mice. YouTube creator Blunty, for instance, posted several minutes of footage of Cyberpunk 2077 on Switch 2 and showed off how you can switch between Joy-Con
title: Cyberpunk 2077 On Switch 2 Apparently Supports Mouse And Keyboard

description:
The Blue Shell is one of the most iconic and divisive items in all of Mario Kart, and with the release of Mario Kart World, fans are digging into new intricacies and strategies. It turns out MKW has introduced a new way to avoid the hated item. And unlike many other methods, this one doesn't require you to hold onto a specific item to pull it off.

Giant Bomb's Jeff Grubb noted that you can you can avoid the Blue Shell with a clever use of the new Rewind feature. Your kart simply rewinds a few seconds and the Blue Shell detonates in front of you, with plenty of space for you to swerve around it. That does make it a trade-off, since you'll lose a little ground by rewinding while the other racers will continue on--but it's much less of a penalty than getting hit by the shell, which also makes you
title: Dodge Blue Shells In Mario Kart World With This One Weird Trick

description:
The Zelda Notes app is live with the launch of Nintendo Switch 2, acting as a companion service for Breath of the Wild and Tears of the Kingdom. It offers help with navigation, some random daily bonuses, and a few other features, but how they work and whether they're worth your time is another matter.

We've explained how to link Zelda Notes to your game below, along with what the app's major functions do and when they might be helpful to use.

How to link Zelda Notes to a game
title: How To Use Zelda Notes App For Tears Of The Kingdom And Breath Of The Wild

description:
A Mass Effect TV series has been in the works for a long time, but it seems to be picking up steam. In November 2024, the TV series was revived at Amazon MGM Studios, and now it's reportedly brought on a showrunner in Doug Jung, according to Deadline.

Jung wrote for Netflix's acclaimed serial killer show Mindhunter and the movie Star Trek Beyond. He's also the showrunner on the upcoming Apple TV+ series Chief of War starring Jason Momoa.

A showrunner is a key position on a TV series. This is the person who runs... the show. A showrunner oversees many creative decisions, including scripts, along with many other duties.
title: Mass Effect TV Show Brings On One Of Its Most Important Creative Roles - Report

description:
Base-building is one of the core elements in Dune: Awakening. The environment on Arrakis is harsh and unforgiving, and to survive on the planet, you need a safe space to call your own and craft new supplies to keep you protected. While you're introduced to base-building fairly early on, the game doesn't offer a ton of explanation for where to build your base and how to perform some basic actions.

Fortunately, we have put together a detailed guide on base-building in Dune: Awakening so you know exactly what you're doing when construction starts on your dream Arrakis home.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • How to start base-building in Dune: Awakening

How to start base-building in D
title: Dune: Awakening Base-Building Guide: Best Base Locations And How To Destroy Structures

description:
Dune: Awakening is a new MMORPG that can be played completely solo or in a party with your friends. If you're looking to take on the planet of Arrakis with a party, then you'll need to follow a few steps to get multiplayer working.

In the guide below, we'll show you everything you need to know about multiplayer in Dune: Awakening, how to add friends, and how to join up with friends to make a party that can play together.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • How to add friends in Dune: Awakening

How to add friends in Dune: Awakening

As of right now, Dune: Awakening is only available on PC via Steam. While the game is planned to eventually arrive on console, you're limited to playing wi
title: Dune: Awakening Multiplayer Guide: How To Party Up With Friends
Dune Fans Can Save 20% On The 1,369-Piece Ornithopter Display Model

description:
Importing Switch saves to Nintendo Switch 2 is something you should automatically be able to do when you first set the system up. However, if you skip the transfer or don't have your original Switch with you, there is another way. It just takes a bit longer.

Our guide for how to transfer save data to Switch 2 explains each step of the process.

How to import save data during Switch 2 setup
title: How To Import Game Save Data On Nintendo Switch 2

description:
Dune: Awakening's official launch date is June 10, but if you're impatient to play the game, you can currently grab the Deluxe or Ultimate Edition to play early. Stats from Steam suggest that a lot of people can't wait for the full launch day and have taken that early access option: Well over 70,000 players are online in the game at the time of this writing, and concurrent players peaked at over 90,000 soon after the premium editions were made available.

According to SteamDB, Dune: Awakening is off to a remarkably hot start considering the premium charge that players currently must pay to get access. To put its player base into perspective, Dune: Awakening is currently sitting at 17th on the Steam concurrent player charts, sandwiched between chart mainstays War Thunder an
title: A Lot Of People Are Playing Dune: Awakening--Despite Being In Premium Early Access

description: Lego On
title: Lego One Piece Will Debut With Seven Building Sets You Can Preorder Now
Amazon-Exclusive Steelbook For New John Wick Spin-Off Is Surprisingly Cheap

description:
Switch 2's best-sellers at launch


Nintendo fans have stormed retailers to get the coveted Switch 2, and some heavy-hitting games have already floated to the top of the Nintendo eShop charts just a day after its release.

According to Nintendo, the 15 titles listed under the "Best Sellers" tab are the "top-selling titles over the last three days, based on revenue." As of Friday, June 6, Mario Kart World tops the list--an unsurprising feat considering it's Nintendo's only original first-party title at launch, and how massively successful its predecessor, Mario Kart 8, was.

Underneath Mario Kart World are other first-party games, including the Switch 2 Editions of The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdo
title: Here Are The Switch 2's Best-Selling Games So Far

description:
The planet of Arrakis is unforgiving from the moment you exit the character creator, and it's where you'll spend your entire journey in Dune: Awakening. There is constant heat, scavengers looking to gun you down, and the mighty sandworm that threatens your every move across the vast, sandy desert. While Dune: Awakening does offer some in-depth tutorials, those can only take you so far.

So, to help get your adventure started on the right foot, we have put together six beginner tips that you'll want to make sure you know before putting too many hours into the MMO.


Don't fear the sandworm


Easily the biggest threat at all times in Dune: Awakening is the sandworm. This mighty, undergr
title: 6 Beginner Tips To Help You Survive Arrakis In Dune: Awakening

description:
Samantha Kelly, who has voiced Princess Peach and Toad in Nintendo games for nearly two decades, is seemingly no longer going to play those parts going forward. Kelly announced today, June 6, that Nintendo is recasting Peach and Todd with other actors.

In a post on Instagram, Kelly thanked fans for "so many years of friendship and joy." Kelly said she is "sad that it's over," adding that she would have liked to voice Peach and Toad for her entire life. She said she was informed of the decision on June 5, the day the Switch 2 and Mario Kart World launched.

"Nintendo let me know yesterday that they decided to recast these roles. I
title: Princess Peach And Toad Actor Says Nintendo Has Replaced Her After 18 Years

description:
From the moment you step foot on Arrakis in Dune: Awakening, you're worried about your hydration level. The meter on the far left side of your screen is as unforgiving as anything else in the MMO, and keeping your character hydrated is constantly a goal for the majority of the early game.

Unfortunately, your methods of staying hydrated are extremely limited at the start of Dune: Awakening. You have the dew plants, but those only allow you to gain one level of hydration. To fully fill up your hydration meter, you need to acquire copious amounts of water and, eventually, blood to ensure your character doesn't die out in the hot sands of Arrakis.

To see the best ways to get water and blood in Dune: Awakening, take a look at the guide below.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Best Ways To Get Blood And Water In Dune: Awakening

description:
During the early stages of Dune: Awakening, you'll be tasked with acquiring a few basic resources that will serve as the foundation of your character's gear and base items. Some of these resources include Granite, Plant Fiber, and Salvaged Metal. You'll also be asked to add some Fuel Cells to your inventory, as those are what you use to power anything electronic in Dune: Awakening.

When it comes to Granite and Plant Fiber, you'll have no issues whatsoever finding either of those resources, as they're as abundant as the sand on Arrakis. However, Salvaged Metal and Fuel Cells take a little more searching to find. Below, you can see exactly how to get Salvaged Metal and Fuel Cells for all of your early game needs in Dune: Awakening.

Where to find Salvaged Metal in Dune: Awakening

Out of the two resources, Salvaged Metal is the easier one to find. One of your first missions in Dune: Awakening requires you
title: Best Ways To Get Salvaged Metal And Fuel Cells In Dune: Awakening

description:
2K Games has announced a new promotion to give away copies of Borderlands 2 on a Steam for a limited time. Now through June 8 at 10 AM PT / 1 PM ET, anyone can grab a copy of the 2012 shooter from Valve's PC games store.

Get Borderlands 2 on Steam for free

Additionally, 2K has rolled out a franchise-wide sale that offers discounts across numerous games in the series and add-on content. This include
title: Borderlands 2 Is Free Right Now On Steam But You Need To Hurry

description:
Call of Duty's Season 4 update has seemingly caused a problem with an operator skin for Frank Woods, and players will find the skin is currently unavailable to use in both Black Ops 6 and Warzone.

According to Treyarch's Trello board, the developer disabled the "Numbers" operator skin for Frank Woods on May 31, which is just days after the Season 4 update. Treyarch is investigating a bug that caused this operator skin to glow much brighter than intended.

The Numbers skin was part of the "Frank Woods Operator Pack," which was a preorder bonus given out to those who preordered the digital or Vau
title: This Call Of Duty Skin Is Broken And Temporarily Removed

description:
GameShare Goodness


One of the overlooked new features for Switch 2 is GameShare, which offers the ability to let other people play select titles on their systems with only one copy of the game. This can be co-op with a buddy or even competitive multiplayer. So far, Nintendo has detailed six games that support this functionality, such as Super Mario Odyssey and Super Mario Party Jamboree + Jamboree TV - Switch 2 Edition.

Here's a quick breakdown of how GameShare works: Locally, Switch 2 owners can share compatible titles with other Switch 2 and original Switch players. But online through
title: Every Game That Supports Switch 2's GameShare, Including Super Mario Odyssey

description:
The Switch 2 and its launch titles are available now, including Mario Kart World. Players have discovered that, like Mario Kart 8 Deluxe for the Switch, Mario Kart World has smart steering turned on by default. Smart steering is an auto-pilot function, of sorts, helping players literally stay on track.

It's a helpful feature for those who want it, but it's not for everyone. Thankfully, it's easy to toggle off. You can toggle it off by pressing X during the vehicle-selection screen, or it can be turned off from the pause menu mid-race.

Mario Kart World also has auto-accelerate, auto-use item, and tilt controls, but these are not toggled on by default. Mario Kart 8 Deluxe worked this way as well, so this is n
title: Mario Kart World Has Smart Steering On By Default, But It's Easy To Toggle Off

description:
Now that the Nintendo Switch 2 and its initial wave of accessories have made it into fans' hands, players have been surprised to discover that Nintendo's GameCube controller for the Switch 2 supports gyro controls.

The new controller, available exclusively through Nintendo Switch Online and at select physical Nintendo stores, looks almost exactly like an original GameCube controller but features some key upgrades. The original c-stick doubles as the Switch 2's new C-button, which will open GameChat, and the internals have been re-arranged for a more responsive d-pad, according to a parts breakdown on Reddit.

The most surprising new addition is the gyroscope, which wasn't mentioned by Nintendo in the lead-up to the Switch 2's release. Surprised fans instead discovered the added functional
title: The Nintendo Switch Online GameCube Controller Supports Gyro Controls

description: Dune: Awakening arrives June 10 for standard edition players, but for those with the deluxe edition, the game launched Thursday. Coinciding with the head-start release is some in-game loot that you can earn via Twitch Drops. The Twitch campaign runs until June 24, with three items up for grabs to help with your base defenses. To get these items, you will need to watch Twitch streams of Dune: Awakening, where the creator has drops enabled.
title: Dune: Awakening Twitch Drops And How To Get Them

description:
Nintendo Switch Game Vouchers are a handy way to get a neat little discount on select digital Switch games, giving Nintendo Switch Online members the option to purchase two games for just $100. Now that the Switch 2 is out, Nintendo has specified that these vouchers can't be redeemed for Switch 2 exclusives--though they can still be used on the new console for original Switch games.

In the Switch 2 eShop, the game-vouchers section includes a warning note saying, "Vouchers cannot be redeemed for Nintendo Switch 2 games." The web version of this page also specifies that vouchers are for the original Switch system (including Lite and OLED model) and "cannot be redeemed for games exclusive to Nintendo Switch 2."

The vouchers still can be used on the Switch 2,
title: PSA: Switch 2 Games Don't Support Nintendo's Game-Voucher Program

description:
The hype train will keep rolling down the track today with Summer Game Fest Live, the annual showcase hosted by Geoff Keighley.

Summer Game Fest Live 2025 will kick off from the YouTube Theater in Los Angeles, California on June 6 at 2 PM PT / 5 PM ET. Multiple games have already been teased for an appearance at the show, including Mafia: The Old Country, Splitgate 2, and Fortnite.

How to watch Summer Game Fest Live 2025

Summer Game Fest will be available to stream on YouTube and Twitch channels. The show can also be viewed live on X, Facebook, and Steam.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Summer Game Fest Live 2025: Start Time, How To Watch, And What To Expect

description:
Black Myth: Wukong, one of 2024's best-selling games worldwide, is finally headed to Xbox after a year of exclusivity on PlayStation. The game is coming to Xbox Series X|S on August 20, with preorders opening on June 18.

The game originally released on PS5 and PC on August 20, 2024, meaning it's coming to Xbox Series X|S precisely one year later. This is fueling the theory that Sony did, in fact, have a one-year exclusivity deal with developer Game Science.

Some had claimed that technical issues with the Xbox Series S prompted a delay for the Xbox version, but Microsoft maintained this was not true (despite the fact that
title: Black Myth: Wukong Xbox Release Date Is Exactly One Year After PS5
